alert.note: Alert for Caribou Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 4:29PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorm west of Thayne lifting north towards Palisades Reservoir through 515 PM MDT... At 425 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 8 miles west of Thayne, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs, blow around unsecured objects, and create difficult boating conditions on Palisades Reservoir. Locations impacted include... Palisades Reservoir, Freedom, and Alpine Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Palisades Reservoir, now would be a good time to move to shore. Strong winds will create rough chop and difficult boating conditions. Lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
